casebody.data:
IN RE the Personal Restraint of Royal Wallace DRAYTON, Petitioner. No. 94924-7 Supreme Court of Washington. DATED at Olympia, Washington, October 31, 2018.

ORDER DENYING MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION

¶ 1 The Court considered the Petitioner's "MOTION TO RECONSIDER ORDER DISMISSING PRP ACCORDING TO RAP 12.4(a)"; ¶ 2 Now, therefore, it is hereby ¶ 3 ORDERED: ¶ 4 That the motion for reconsideration is denied. For the Court /s/ Fairhurst, C.J.

CHIEF JUSTICE
